```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggraph)
library(patchwork)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = here::here())
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r load-data, include=FALSE}
targets::tar_load(graphs)
targets::tar_load(file_child_viz_graph)
```

Here we visualize the continuous graphs of each time point for each subject and each type of response form.

```{r render-content, results='asis'}
users <- unique(graphs$SID)
for (user in users) {
  knitr::knit(
    text = knitr::knit_expand(file_child_viz_graph),
    quiet = TRUE
  ) |> 
    cat()
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
